source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic video captures a wide view of a massive waterfall system. The camera performs a slow pan from right to left, showcasing the numerous cascades of water tumbling over a long, rocky cliff covered in lush green vegetation. The entire landscape is framed by a dense, tropical forest.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic video captures a wide view of a massive waterfall system. The camera performs a slow pan from right to left, showcasing the numerous cascades of water tumbling over a long, rocky cliff covered in lush green vegetation. The entire landscape is framed by a dense, tropical forest.

generated_critique: The video also shows a group of people walking along a footpath at the base of the waterfall.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenic video captures a wide view of a massive waterfall system. The camera performs a slow pan from right to left, showcasing the numerous cascades of water tumbling over a long, rocky cliff covered in lush green vegetation. A group of people can be seen walking along a footpath at the base of the waterfall, adding a sense of scale to the breathtaking scene. The entire landscape is framed by a dense, tropical forest.
